compliant.section: When you register for a community or a partner program, we collect account registration information like your name, email address, address, company, phone number, or other information.
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing is necessary for the performance of a contract.

compliant.section: You may provide comments, communications, feedback, ratings, or other information when you use the Services or any of our communities or partner programs.
When you create an account, you provide us with your account registration and profile information (name, email address, company, and similar information).
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing is necessary for the performance of a contract.

compliant.section: We collect information about you when you login and how you interact with the Services, the features you use, clicks, log information about your use of the Services, and how you interact with other users.
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interests of the controller (e.g., improving services, security).

compliant.section: Content or Information You Provide in the Services: The Services allow you to create connections or integrations between the third-party applications you use.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent of the data subject or data processing is necessary for the performance of a contract, depending on the nature of the service.

compliant.section: When you use the Services, information or content is transferred from one application to another application.
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing is necessary for the performance of a contract.

compliant.section: We collect the information that is transferred between the third-party applications.
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing is necessary for the performance of a contract.

compliant.section: Content You Provide Through Our Site: If the Site or our social media platform pages allow you to upload content or information, we will collect the content or information you upload.
For example, when you provide feedback, participate in any interactive features, surveys, contests, promotions, sweepstakes, activities, or events, you may provide us information or content.

Information You Provide Through Support Channels or Communities: You may provide information or content to us through the customer support or chat functionality we make available on the Site, in the Services, or other sites that we control.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent of the data subject or Legitimate interests of the controller (e.g., providing customer support).

non_compliant.section: We automatically track certain information about your use of the Services, partner programs, or communities.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation - data must be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the purposes for tracking user data and ensure they are limited to what is necessary.

non_compliant.section: We describe the information we collect through the Services in more detail in Zapier Services statement.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and modalities - information provided to data subjects must be concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible.
non_compliant.amend: Provide the information directly in the privacy policy or make the Zapier Services statement easily accessible.

non_compliant.section: We describe the information we collect through your use of the Services in more detail in the Zapier Services statement.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and modalities - information provided to data subjects must be concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible.
non_compliant.amend: Provide the information directly in the privacy policy or make the Zapier Services statement easily accessible.

non_compliant.section: Other users may provide information about individuals when they submit content or information through the Services.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimisation - data must be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary.
non_compliant.amend: Implement mechanisms to limit the collection of personal data by other users to what is necessary for the specific purpose.

non_compliant.section: For example, if a user sets up a Zap that allows automated calendaring, that user will share information about the individuals they schedule meetings with via the Zap.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimisation - data must be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary.
non_compliant.amend: Implement mechanisms to limit the sharing of personal data through Zaps to what is necessary for the specific purpose.

non_compliant.section: Users may also provide information about their teammates, including name and email address, to invite teammates to use the Services.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimisation - data must be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary.
non_compliant.amend: Provide alternative invitation methods that do not require the collection of personal data from the inviter.

non_compliant.section: Similarly, an administrator may provide your contact information if they designate you as a user, the billing contact, technical contact, or administrator.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimisation - data must be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary.
non_compliant.amend: Provide administrators with guidance on minimizing the collection and sharing of personal data.

non_compliant.section: You or your administrator may integrate the Services with third-party applications.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: Inform users about the potential collection and processing of their data when integrating with third-party applications.

non_compliant.section: In such case, we will receive information that allows us to identify your account within the third-party applications (like name, email address, phone number, tokens, or other identifying information), the log data, content, and device information.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimisation - data must be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary.
non_compliant.amend: Limit the collection of data from third-party applications to what is necessary for the specific integration.

non_compliant.section: The information or content we receive from your organization is subject to your organizationâ€™s privacy policies.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: Provide users with clear information about how their data is processed when provided by their organization.

non_compliant.section: When you integrate our Services with a third-party application, the information we receive depends on the settings, permissions, and privacy Statement controlled by that third-party application.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: Provide users with clear information about the potential data sharing implications of integrating with third-party applications.
